external_games.name: Exoprimal - Krieger Alpha Tin Machine Set

name: Exoprimal: Krieger Alpha Tin Machine Set
summary: This pack includes five cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the Tank suit Krieger α, which uses a chargeable shotgun with wide-range scatter shot and compressed fire options. Tin Machine robots transcend generations and are loved by all! Equip these cosmetic items and develop a sturdy defense!
